subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Florian Thauvin scored one goal and created another to help host Marseille beat Nantes, 2-0, and extend its lead atop the French league to 4 points.
snippet: Florian Thauvin scored one goal and created another to help host Marseille beat Nantes, 2-0, and extend its lead atop the French league to 4 points.
